creator: sirisha choudary vakalapudi
title: Colorful Fort for the little one :)
materials_required: Quick dry sheet or a cloth
description: This project details how to create a simple and colorful fort for a young child using an empty carton box. It is designed to be inexpensive and easily moved.
steps: Cut an opening in the empty carton box based on the child's height, allowing them to easily enter and play inside.
Paste color paper sheets onto the carton box using glue to decorate it. (e.g., blue, orange, and red colors)
Place a quick dry sheet or a cloth inside the fort to protect the box from spills, especially useful for younger children.
Place the toys to attract your child.
